long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides ads and other annoying suggestions on your social media news feeds. We currently support Facebook™. Scroll through updates without the constant nagging of advertisers you don't want to engage with in the first place.

Disclaimer: This browser extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by Facebook, Inc. or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates. It is an independent product created by the software creator and is not connected to or endorsed by the Facebook platform in any way. This product is provided to the user free of charge.
